name: FRIANT WATER AUTHORITY (FORMERLY FRIANT WATER USERS AUTHORITY)
sampleDescriptions: FY19 Consolidated Appropriations Act, H.R 5895.

USBOR policies; implementation of the San Joaquin River Restoration Settlement; San Joaquin River operations; Sacramento-San Joaquin Delta operations; Central Valley Project operations;  implementation of WRDA/WIIN 2016 (PL 114-322); title transfer legislation, H.R. 3281; Friant-Kern Canal repair; Water Supply Drought Resilience Act, S.2563 (groundwater recharge provisions); Reclamation Title Transfer Act, S.2560; American's Water Infrastructure Act S. 3021; FISH Act H.R. 3961.
